biography: Roos is dedicated to improving human well-being through technology. As a Health Tech Specialist, she works on developing tools and platforms that empower individuals to take control of their health. Combining her deep empathy with a rigorous, data-driven approach, she is passionate about everything from wearable biometric sensors to AI-powered diagnostic tools. She has a calming presence and a genuine desire to help others live healthier, better lives.
